products.name: Basics To Advanced In React
products.overview: Learn React from the ground up and advance to building complex applications.
products.long_description: This course teaches the fundamentals of React, then dives into more advanced topics such as Redux and React Native.

products.name: Django Framework for Beginners
products.overview: Learn the basics of Django and start building web applications.
products.long_description: This course covers Django's core concepts such as models, views, templates, and forms, and introduces students to building full-stack web applications.

products.name: The Complete Guide to Backend Development
products.overview: Learn everything you need to know about building a scalable and robust backend system.
products.long_description: This course covers backend development concepts such as APIs, databases, servers, and security, with hands-on exercises and real-world examples.

products.name: The Future of Design Systems
products.overview: Discover the latest trends and techniques in creating design systems for modern interfaces.
products.long_description: This course explores how design systems are evolving to meet the needs of today's complex digital products, covering topics such as design tokens, component libraries, and design ops.

products.name: Build a Blockchain from Scratch in Go
products.overview: Learn the basics of blockchain technology and build your own blockchain from scratch using Go.
products.long_description: This course covers the fundamental concepts of blockchain and guides students through the development of a basic blockchain system using the Go programming language.

products.name: Frontend Fastlane Plan With Projects
products.overview: Learn how to build fast and efficient front-end applications with practical projects.
products.long_description: This course covers front-end development concepts such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, with a focus on practical projects to build skills and experience.

products.name: Master the Code Review
products.overview: Learn how to effectively review code and provide constructive feedback to team members.
products.long_description: This course covers best practices for code review, including code quality standards, reviewing techniques, and providing actionable feedback to improve code quality.

products.name: JavaScript Basics To Advance
products.overview: Learn JavaScript from the basics to advanced topics with industry experts.
products.long_description: This course covers JavaScript fundamentals, object-oriented programming, asynchronous programming, and advanced topics such as React and Node.js, with guidance from an experienced instructor.

products.name: Python Deep Dive With Projects
products.overview: Take a deep dive into Python programming with practical projects.
products.long_description: This course covers Python basics, data structures, functions, and advanced topics such as web scraping, data analysis, and machine learning, with hands-on projects to build skills and experience.

products.name: Mastering Software Technique
products.overview: Learn best practices for software development and build better software.
products.long_description: This course covers software development techniques such as design patterns, testing, code quality, and debugging, with a focus on practical examples and real-world applications.

products.name: Web Development Foundation
products.overview: Learn the basics of web development and start building web applications.
products.long_description: This course covers web development fundamentals such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and introduces students to building dynamic and interactive web applications.

products.name: Mastering Git and GitHub - A Practical Guide
products.overview: Learn how to use Git and GitHub effectively for version control and collaboration.
products.long_description: This course covers Git and GitHub basics, branching, merging, pull requests, and other features, with hands-on exercises and real-world examples.

products.name: Everything About React v16
products.overview: Learn everything you need to know about React v16, the latest version of the popular front-end framework.
products.long_description: This course covers React v16 fundamentals, component architecture, state management, and advanced topics such as server-side rendering and testing, with practical examples and real-world applications.

products.name: Diving Deep With Python 2.7
products.overview: Learn advanced Python techniques and all about Python 2.7.

products.name: Kickstart Your UI Design Career
products.overview: Jumpstart your UI design career with practical and valuable skills.
products.long_description: This course covers the practical skills needed to kickstart your UI design career, including wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Perfect for beginners.
